Room.Name: Entrance to the Dragon's Citadel
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the hallway entrance to the great Dragon's Citadel.
Room.LongDescription: The Dragon's Citadel is known for it's mystical healing powers and superior magical spells. No one has really ventured further into the Citadel beyond the Great Gates which you can see to the distance in the north. Those who have, have never returned, but just entering the Citadel, travelers and explorers have felt a mystic wave of power overwhelming them.
